description: diamond shape carving in forearm and neck, detail leaf design in metal of trigger guard with gold elk and bear with sheep on bottom of neck; gold plate with "J. R. McCann" engraved on bottom side of stock; "No. 811 Griffin & Howe, Inc New York" engraved on top of barrel
dimension: 44 x 9 3/4 x 2 3/4 in. (111.76 x 24.77 x 6.99 cm) (at charging handle)
title: Bolt-Action Sporting Rifle
